original_title: Guess How Much I Love You: The Adventures of Little Nutbrown Hare - An Enchanting Easter
overview: As Winter melts into Spring and the meadow bursts forth with new life, Little Nutbrown Hare sees a rare sightâ€¦ a pure white fawn, dancing in the moonlight. Nobody in the meadow has ever seen a white fawn and think he is making up stories. But Little White Owl tells of a place of mystical white creatures in the next valley, so the friends go on an adventure.
title: Guess How Much I Love You: The Adventures of Little Nutbrown Hare - An Enchanting Easter
